entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:28 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Woodstock 12:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: SE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. A few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers and periods of freezing rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
